description: Greatest p with p, q both prime, p+q = 2n.
links: H. J. Smith, Table of n, a(n) for n = 2..20000
mathematica: a[n_] := {p, q} /. {ToRules @ Reduce[p+q == 2*n, {p, q}, Primes]} // Max; Table[a[n], {n, 2, 100}] (* _Jean-Fran√ßois Alcover_, Dec 19 2013 *)
prog: (Haskell)a020482 = last . a171637_row  -- _Reinhard Zumkeller_, Mar 03 2014(PARI) a(n)=forprime(q=2,n,if(isprime(2*n-q), return(2*n-q))) \\ _Charles R Greathouse IV_, Apr 28 2015
author: _David W. Wilson_
